Tour.name: note-input
Tour.Message: This is the note input toolbar
To get started, click the note input icon. Or you can press "N".
You can select a duration to add by clicking one of these icons.
To enter rests, select this icon and a duration.
Accidentals can be added to notes by selecting these icons.
To change voices, click these number icons.
